brands.title: Explore Our Diverse Range of Brands

hero.title: Advancing Healthcare in Indonesia with Premier Medical Equipment Solutions
hero.subtitle: We are bridging medical equipment manufacturers with medical professionals and consumers all over Indonesia. We provide leading-edge services in the healthcare industry through strong partnerships, quality products, and excellent service to deliver the best quality to our customers.

items.title: Cardio
items.subtitle: Distributing major Western brands in Intervention Cardiology and Electrophysiology solutions requiring deep technical know-how / professional applicants 24/7.

items.title: Diabetic
items.subtitle: The only official distributor in the whole of Indonesia of technology solutions for Insulin-dependent diabetes patients and specialty clinics.

items.title: Dental
items.subtitle: Distributing major Western and Asian brands of capital equipment, hand tools and consumables for all dental specialties with a dedicated sales team and supporting category specialists in Greater Jakarta.

about.title: About Us

hero.title: Advancing Indonesian Healthcare with PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama
paragraphs: PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama is a fast growing company engaged in marketing, distribution, and sales of medical equipment. Established in 2017, PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama dedicated advancing the healthcare in Indonesia.

We are bridging medical equipment manufacturers with consumers all over Indonesia. We provide leading-edge services in the healthcare industry through strong partnerships, quality products, and excellent service to deliver the best quality to our customers.

about.faq_subtitle: If you want to know more about payment products, registration, or solutions to problems you are experiencing, we are always ready to help you. Contact us via social media or the chat button on the right. You can also visit our Help Center.

timelines.title: Establishment of PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama
timelines.description: Issuance of the establishment deed of PT Tigasatu Medika Pratama.

timelines.title: Partnership with GE
timelines.description: Began USG business by establishing a business relationship with GE for the first time.

timelines.title: Addition of Cardio Business Line
timelines.description: Expanded business scope to include cardio with the distribution of GE ECG products.

timelines.title: Partnership with PT. Djembatan Dua
timelines.description: Started a partnership with PT. Djembatan Dua for the distribution of USG and ECG GE products.

timelines.title: Awarded as Best New Channel Partner – Ultrasound
timelines.description: Received an award as 'Best New Channel Partner – Ultrasound' at the GE event in Singapore on January 24-25.

timelines.title: Addition of Diabetic Business Line and Partnership with Medtronic
timelines.description: Expanded into the diabetes sector to serve the growing number of diabetics in Indonesia and became a distributor of Medtronic for Injection Port and Continuous Glucose Monitor (CGM) products.

timelines.title: Addition of Insulin Pump Product Distribution
timelines.description: Introduced Medtronic's insulin pump products in Indonesia.

timelines.title: Partnership with Boston Scientific
timelines.description: Added to the cardio product portfolio for PCI and ablation procedures by becoming a distributor of Boston Scientific. Distributed PCI products include drug-eluting stents, coronary balloons, and IntraVascular Ultrasound (IVUS). Ablation products include catheters for 2D and 3D ablation procedures.

timelines.title: Partnership with Biotronik
timelines.description: Formed a partnership with Biotronik (Germany) for products such as drug-eluting stents, coronary balloons, drug-coated balloons, aspiration catheters, and covered stents.

timelines.title: Addition of Dental Business Line and Partnership with Mensa Group
timelines.description: Expanded into the dental field and formed a partnership with Mensa Group to distribute various dental products such as dental units, panoramic units, periapical units, and daily consumables for dentists.

timelines.title: Partnership with PT Mentari Murni Mulia
timelines.description: Added state-of-the-art dental products such as those from Kerr, in collaboration with PT Mentari Murni Mulia.

vision.title: T.I.G.A. Principles: The Pillars of Our Ethos and Excellence
vision.subtitle: Embodying Thankfulness, Integrity, Genuineness, and Agility, our core values guide us in forging meaningful relationships and achieving excellence in every endeavor. They are not just values, they are our commitment to growth, trust, authenticity, and adaptability.

values.title: Thankful
values.description: Rasa syukur kepada Tuhan dan pemangku kepentingan menjadi hal yang utama. Membuat perusahaan mau menerima masukan untuk terus berkembang.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: Prinsip perusahaan adalah berkomitmen dan konsisten dalam memberikan pelayanan terbaik sehingga dapat dipercaya oleh pemangku kepentingan.

values.title: Genuine
values.description: Memberikan pelayanan dengan ikhlas dan memahami apa yang harus dilakukan sehingga dapat saling membangun.

values.title: Agile
values.description: Memiliki kemampuan beradaptasi terhadap perubahan, sehingga dapat membangun bisnis dengan cepat.

team.founder_title: Founders and Management of The Company
team.founder_subtitle: Our Founders and Managements is comprised of experienced professionals with a passion for helping others achieve their goals.

founders.name: Hendrik Kianto
founders.title: Founder
founders.bio: MBA, Harvard Business School. Prior experiences include P&G and McKinsey & Co in strategic management & finance. Business interest in steel, food, and distributions.

founders.name: Erwin Tenggono
founders.title: Co-Founder
founders.bio: MBA, Prasetya Mulya Business School. Has 31 years senior executive at healthcare Industry. Sought after speaker on management and organization.

founders.name: Christian Van Schoote
founders.title: Director
founders.bio: MBA, INSEAD. Prior experiences include Director at Delhaize Group, Chief Executive Officer at MAP, Chief Operating Officer at Bhinneka, and Engagement Manager at McKinsey & Co.

cta.title: Be Part of the Health Revolution
cta.subtitle: Join us in transforming Indonesia's healthcare. Reach out now and let's make a difference together!

vacancies.title: We’re always looking for awesome people to join us
vacancies.subtitle: Embark on a Rewarding Career Journey with Us: Discover Exciting Career Paths, Contribute to Transforming Indonesia's Healthcare Landscape, and Be a Part of Our Mission to Innovate for a Healthier Tomorrow

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.overview: Join our team as a Sales Development Representative where you'll be instrumental in driving our business growth. Your role involves engaging with potential clients, identifying opportunities, and nurturing leads to set the stage for successful sales. You'll harness your communication skills and strategic thinking to create a robust pipeline, contributing directly to our company's success in the competitive healthcare sector.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.overview: As a Software Engineer, you'll play a pivotal role in developing innovative software solutions that advance healthcare technology. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code. Your expertise will be crucial in solving complex technical challenges and delivering high-quality products that make a meaningful impact in the healthcare industry.
